Nerangs.ab: āat̰ dīš āuuaeδaiiamahi sukure va hum pyāle u ruy-e sang-e urvis nahādan asniiaēibiiō aṣ̌ahe hāuuanə̄e aṣ̌aone aṣ̌ahe raϑβe y. v. x. f. āat̰ dast-e rāst bordan va daste-ye hāvan dar hāvan zadan hāvan škāftan va bar dāštan āvardan-e u dast-e rāst-e zud bar ruy-e sang-e urvis sarnegān kardan daste durtar ruy-e sang-urvis nahādan pas āat̰ dīš āuuaeδaiiamahi sāuuaŋhə̄e vīsīāica aṣ̌aone aṣ̌ahe raϑβe y. v. x. f.

"(He must recite) āat̰ dīš āuuaeδaiiamahi and place the cup and the hum-pyāle on the urvis-stone (while saying) asniiaēibiiō aṣ̌ahe hāuuanə̄e aṣ̌aone aṣ̌ahe raϑβe y. v. x. f. āat̰ and bring them to the right and hit the hāvan with the pestle of the hāvan, strike the hāvan, take it and bring it to the right hand of the zud and put it on the urvis-stone upside-down and then (continue with) āat̰ dīš āuuaeδaiiamahi sāuuaŋhə̄e vīsīāica aṣ̌aone aṣ̌ahe raϑβe y. v. x. f."
